author: Josh Gerstein
title: Judge, defense clash in Theranos case over shelter-in-place orders
description: Elizabeth Holmes’ lawyers argue virus response put her defense team at a disadvantage compared to prosecutors.
content: Avila, an appointee of President Barack Obama, suggested that most of the work Holmes defense needed to do could be accomplished from home. And to buttress his point, hed apparently done a little research of his own: pulling up a statement Williams & Conn… [+4579 chars]
